body: mutation {createfulfillmentprovider ( fulfillmentprovider: { id: "2cd22324-4619-4f98-8319-f6f3cabc62d8", name: "test", provider: { name: "Hashtag", username:"test", password:"test", threepl_key: "{b2e7e741-3dd2-4d2e-bfe2-0649fa35a7ab}", threepl_customer_id: 12}}) {id, name, provider { ... on Hashtag { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key } ... on ThreePL { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key, threepl_id, threepl_facility_id } ... on TestFulfillmentProvider { name } ... on ShipStation { name, api_key, api_secret } }, created_at, updated_at}}
